主要是来夸一夸杀机的，但是吐槽也是该吐槽的。吐槽是吐槽他的匹配机制：请问20段的屠夫是怎么排到5段以上的人类的？修机快如飞还被遛到自闭，勾到的人还被手电筒照下来了。我说能不能考虑安排萌新给萌新当对手啊？你不能因为我游戏买了三年就默认我是巨佬啊（其实只玩了四十个小时）。游戏自然是极好玩的，杀手和逃生者都有自己的乐趣。作为非对称竞技的开山鼻祖，杀机的游戏性极强。总之还是相当喜欢这个游戏的，就是匹配机制实在是很无语。另外，建议出个匹配模式，全是排位心理压力有点大。
ps：单排独浪的萌新想找个队友一起上树聊人生（今年高三毕业）
um jogo que realmente é bom, se quiser jogar pra se divertir com amigos ou para jogar sozinho pode comprar que vale a pena.

I'm no game reviewer, but I never thought i'd enjoy this game as much as i do (hence writing this review). 

Playing with friends makes for some of the most tense and funny scenarios. It has quite a learning curve when it comes to the perks and blood-web, but it adds to the thrill and excitement. Not knowing which perks the killer (or survivors) has makes every match feel fresh and different.

The amount of licensed characters and maps from iconic horror franchises are incredible. Each one with perks and abilities that relate to their source material.

Gameplay feels well balanced with killers having a speed advantage to make up for numbers, but survivors have multiple ways of slowing them down with obstacles or objects and well timed runs/loops.

And oh lawd the dopamine when you successfully lose or 360 palletslamwindowyeet a killer. In turn, seeing survivors run into walls or try to hide in bushes while popping up behind them is such a vibe.

This game is 10/10 for any horror fan, or just a fun game to play with friends and hear them panic xD.
Да, довольная игра хорошая игра новые обновления ,новые маньяки

I have played this game for a little bit now and my addiction is getting worse. At first everything seems fine, you just reached green rank and you're feeling good. Then you really experience true dead by daylight. The awful mechanics and bugs and busted perks. The moment you get good, the game gets awful. I have tried so long to stop this addiction, every day I get on this game play for hours at a time and have no fun. This game is ruining my brain I can't even go outside without thinking of dead by daylight. I saw a kitchen knife and I was like hey that's micel myers and then I saw a funny shaped tile and I thought hey that's a bear trap haha and I keep hearing that god awful FUCKING LULLABY. I can't take this shit anymore this game is a virus I bought it for my friend (big mistake) and he got hooked on it just as easily it's an awful disease. If you have this game and you haven't played it enough then DELETE IT PLEASE. It only gets worse. I still take therapy because of this nightmare. I fear one day that I might wake up and be the survivor or maybe I am. Maybe this is my infinite torment. Perhaps all my sins and mistakes have caught up to me in form of this. This game is like heroin, you think it's fine until you can't go without it. If someone gets you this game as a gift DON'T ACCEPT IT. This is the only way i can tell people to not get this piece of shit unbalanced broken game. I have tried breaking my pc so I don't have to log on anymore but it had borrowed time and it started flashlight clicking at me. I tried to get out of my room for once but there was a pallet that was stuck. I tried getting out of my window BUT THE ENTITY BLOCKED IT. This game is awful and with each new update release and trailer it just brings more victims in. I can't take it anymore someone help and if you can't just please don't ever, ever, ever, ever e,vcer ,ever, re,vcer, ec,e,cf,asf ea,v,ae,v,es,ea,r,sd,r,ds,de,,,r,,d,c,ed,c,e,,e,r,,,ece,ve,r,ve,re,v get this game ever,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,

The best game in the asymmetric horror genre by far. Despite this, the game isn't anywhere near perfect, but thanks to relatively frequent updates, the game still feels fresh, with every Chapter adding new things to play with and against.
Esta bueno, pero necesitan fixear el hitbox de los personajes

Dead by Daylight: a hide and seek simulator that is incredibly one sided. If you want the easiest game of your life: be a survivor. Every game is a four on one bully pit. If you like cock and ball torture, be a killer. You'll blow your load in three seconds flat, guaranteed.

这游戏匹配机制极其极其极其的垃圾，屎中带毒，玩屠夫十五段几乎把把匹配到一二段的人类，而且大多还是车队，并且全员素质极其低下，无论是门口蹲起，还是游戏结束后聊天框一直垃圾话嘲讽，怪不得这游戏没什么名气，全是这些老玩家自己败的，玩人类也是，碰见的屠夫个顶个的守尸，硬挂死一个才走人，而且还鞭尸，然后至于有没有友好的玩家我已经无所谓了，只要这游戏大部分还是那种垃圾玩家，我就根本看不见友好的，垃圾匹配机制，垃圾的老玩家，本来挺喜欢这样类型氛围的游戏，进去直接脑淤血，呵呵，其他入手这游戏的自己好好想想吧，别花钱买高血压
